name: FourByFourShooter
description:
A some sort of turn-based strategy game where you can only move in the 4x4 tiles. It's a prototype I made on a whim because am trying to push myself to at least finish one game. (even though it's not completely finished)

Some mechanics of the game:

  • Each move consume 1 stamina point
  • Each action consume a specific amount of stamina point. (e.g. "Basic Attack" consume 2 stamina point)
  • Each weapon has maximum range (measured in no. tiles)
  • Weapon damage is calculated by ammo per turn multiply by damage (e.g. M16 Rifle consumed 5 bullet per attack and each bullet deal 2 damage (5 * 2))
  • Cover or any object in front of target reduce the damage the target received by 50%

Controls:

Mouse - Select sector / check details on enemy.

Space - Toggle between Action mode and Move mode

WASD - Move around the tiles in "Move Mode"

AD - Select skill to perform in "Action mode"

WS - Select skill option for some skill (e.g "Change Weapon" skill)

Escape - Show menu
